GV03sb_01_u:1124: sa vā eti ca preti cānvāha /

GV03sb_01_u:1139: so 'nvāha / pra vo vājā abhidyava iti tannu preti bhavati vājā ityannaṃ vai vājā

GV03sb_01_u:1200: hyagnirghṛtena vardhayāmasīti tatsāmidhenam padaṃ samevainaṃ tenendhe

GV03sb_01_u:1208: ado vai pṛthu yasmindevā etacravāyyaṃ yasmindevā acā

GV03sb_01_u:1214: so nvāha / iḍenyo namasya itīḍenyo hyeṣa namasyo hyeṣatirastamāṃsi darṣata iti

GV03sb_01_u:1229: so 'nvāha / agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmaha iti devāśca vā asurāścobhaye prājāpatyāḥ paspṛdhire
GV03sb_01_u:1230: tāṃtspardhamānāṅgāyatryantarā tasthau yā vai sā gāyatryāsīdiyaṃ vai sā pṛthivīyaṃ

GV03sb_01_u:2351: retaḥ siktaṃ tadamuyā syādevaṃ tattasmādu saha vaiva vaṣaṭkāreṇa
GV03sb_01_u:2354: sā vai gāyatrīyaṃ triṣṭubasau sa vai gāyatrīmanvāha
GV03sb_01_u:2357: tadanayā yajanniyaṃ hi yājyāmuṣyā adhi vaṣaṭkarotyasā u hi
GV03sb_01_u:2358: triṣṭuptadene sayujau karoti tasmādime sambhuñjāte anayoranu sambhogamimāḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2362: hi tadrūpaṃ kṣipra eva yājyayā tvareteyaṃ hi yājyā rathantaraṃ hīyaṃ rāthantaraṃ hi
GV03sb_01_u:2363: tadrūpaṃ hvayati vā anuvākyayā prayacati yājyayā tasmādanuvākyāyai rūpaṃ huve
GV03sb_01_u:2364: havāmaha āgacedam barhiḥ sīdeti yaddhvayati hi tayā prayacati yājyayā
GV03sb_01_u:2365: tasmādyājyāyai rūpaṃ vīhi havirjuṣasva havirāvṛṣāya svāddhi piba preti yatpra hi
GV03sb_01_u:2368: sānuvākyā syādasau hyanuvākyā tasyā amuṣyā avastāllakṣma
GV03sb_01_u:2371: sā yājyā syādiyaṃ hi yājyā tasyā asyā
GV03sb_01_u:2375: samṛddhā yājyā yasyā uttamātpadāddevatāyā adhi vaṣaṭkaroti vīryaṃ vai devata
GV03sb_01_u:2376: 'rcastadubhayata evaitadvīryeṇa parigṛhya yasyai devatāyai havirbhavati tasyai
GV03sb_01_u:2379: vāgvai vaṣaṭkāro vāgreto reta evaitatsiñcati ṣaḍityṛtavo vai
GV03sb_01_u:2380: ṣaṭtadṛtuṣvevaitadretaḥ sicyate tadṛtavo retaḥ siktamimāḥ prajāḥ prajanayanti
GV03sb_01_u:2384: piturdāyamupeyuretāvevārdhamāsau ya evāpūryate taṃ devā upāyanyo 'pakṣīyate
GV03sb_01_u:2391: yadā vā etā ubhau pariplavete atha māso bhavati māsaśaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2392: saṃvatsaraḥ sarvaṃ vai saṃvatsaraḥ sarvameva taddevā asurāṇāṃ samavṛñjata
GV03sb_01_u:2396: sa yavāyuvata hi tena devā yo 'surāṇāṃ so 'yavā na hi tenāsurā
GV03sb_01_u:2398: atho itarathāhuḥ ya eva devānāmāsītso 'yavā na hi tamasurā ayuvata yo 'surāṇāṃ sa
GV03sb_01_u:2399: yavāyuvata hi taṃ devāḥ sabdamahaḥ sagarā rātriryavyā māsāḥ sumekaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2400: sveko ha vai nāmaitadyatsumeka iti yavā ca hi vā ayavā yavetīvātha yenaiteṣāṃ hotā
GV03sb_01_u:2408: sa aikṣata / ahāsya hāntaryantyu mā yajñāditi so 'nūccakrāma sa āyatayottarata
GV03sb_01_u:2411: mā visrakṣīriti te vai mā yajñānmāntargatāhutim me kalpayateti
GV03sb_01_u:2412: tatheti sa samabṛhatsa nāsyatsa na kaṃ canāhinat 1.7.3.[5]
GV03sb_01_u:2422: ityāhurvāstu hi tadyajñasya yaddhuteṣu haviḥṣu tasmādyasyai kasyai ca devatāyai
GV03sb_01_u:2423: havirgṛhyate sarvatraiva sviṣṭakṛdanvābhaktaḥ sarvatra hyevainaṃ devā anvābhajan 1.7.3.[8]
GV03sb_01_u:2425: agnirvai sa devastasyaitāni nāmāni śarva iti yathā prācyā
GV03sb_01_u:2426: ācakṣate bhava iti yathā bāhīkāḥ paśūnām patī rudro 'gniriti
GV03sb_01_u:2427: tānyasyāśāntānyevetarāṇi nāmānyagnirityeva śāntatamaṃ tasmādagnaya iti kriyate
GV03sb_01_u:2429: te hocuḥ / yattvayyamutra satyayakṣmahi tannaḥ sviṣṭaṃ kurviti tadebhyaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2434: tatsaumyamājyabhāgamāhāyāḍagneḥ priyā dhāmānīti tadya eṣa ubhayatrācyuta
GV03sb_01_u:2438: prayājānuyājā vai devā ājyapā yakṣadagnerhotuḥ priyā dhāmānīti tadagniṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2439: hotāramāha tadasmā etāṃ devā āhutiṃ kalpayitvāthainenaitadbhūyaḥ samaśāmyanpriya
GV03sb_01_u:2441: taddhaike / devatām pūrvāṃ kurvantyayāṭkārādagnerayāṭsomasyāyāḍiti tadu tathā na
GV03sb_01_u:2442: kuryādviloma ha te yajñe kurvanti ye devatām pūrvāṃ kurvantyayāṭkārādidaṃ hi
GV03sb_01_u:2446: yatra vā ado devatā āvāhayati tadapi svam
GV03sb_01_u:2447: mahimānamāvāhayati tadataḥ prāṅnyai kiṃ cana svāya mahimna iti kriyate tadatra
GV03sb_01_u:2448: tam prīṇāti tatho hāsyaiṣo 'moghāyāvāhito bhavati tasmādāha yakṣatsvam
GV03sb_01_u:2451: prajā vā iṣastā evaitadyāyajūkāḥ karoti tā imāḥ prajā yajamānā
GV03sb_01_u:2455: havirjuṣante tena hi mahajjayati tasmādāha juṣatāṃ haviriti 1.7.3.[16]
GV03sb_01_u:2458: sviṣṭakṛdvaiśvadevaṃ vai tṛtīyasavanam piprīhi devāṃ uśato yaviṣṭheti
GV03sb_01_u:2459: tadanuvākyāyai vaiśvadevamagne yadadya viśo adhvarasya hotariti tadyājyāyai
GV03sb_01_u:2460: vaiśvadevaṃ tadyadete evaṃrūpe bhavatasteno ete tṛtīyasavanasya rūpaṃ tasmādvā ete
GV03sb_01_u:2464: vāstvindriyaṃ vīryaṃ triṣṭubindriyamevaitadvīryaṃ vāstau sviṣṭakṛti dadhāti
GV03sb_01_u:2468: dadhāti pesukaṃ vai vāstu pisyati ha prajayā paśubhiryasyaivaṃ viduṣo 'nuṣṭubhau
GV03sb_01_u:2472: parigṛhṇāmīti sarathātpapāta sa patitvā bāhumapi śaśre sa parimamṛśe yatkimakaraṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2473: tasmādidamāpaditi sa haitadeva mene yadviloma yajñe 'karamiti tasmānna viloma
GV03sb_01_u:2474: kuryātsacandasāveva syātāmubhe vaivānuṣṭubhā ubhe vā triṣṭubhau 1.7.3.[20]
GV03sb_01_u:2477: diktasmāduttarārdhādavadyatyuttarārdhe juhotyetasyai vai diśa udapadyata taṃ tata
GV03sb_01_u:2479: sa vā abhyardha ivetarābhya āhutibhyo juhoti /
GV03sb_01_u:2482: paśava upamūryamāṇā īyustasmādabhyardha ivetarābhya āhutibhyo juhoti 1.7.3.[22]
GV03sb_01_u:2493: mātrāsti yatraiva svayam manasā manyeta tadādadhīta sa yadvā apyalpakamiva
GV03sb_01_u:2495: tadāhuḥ / āhavanīye havīṃṣi śrapayeyurato vai devā divamupodakrāmaṃsteno
GV03sb_01_u:2497: ityapaskhala iva ha sa haviṣāṃ yadgārhapatye śrapayeyuryajña āhavanīyo yajñe
GV03sb_01_u:2500: āhavanīyo vā eṣa na vā eṣa tasmai yadasminnaśṛtaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2501: śrapayeyustasmai vā eṣa yadasmiṃcūtaṃ juhuyurityato yatarathā kāmayeta tathā
GV03sb_01_u:2504: nagnatāya vai bibhemīti kā te 'nagnatetyabhita eva mā
GV03sb_01_u:2505: paristṛṇīyuriti tasmādetadagnimabhitaḥ paristṛṇanti tṛṣṇāyā vai bibhemīti kā te
GV03sb_01_u:2506: tṛptiriti brāhmaṇasyaiva tṛptimanutṛpyeyamiti tasmātsaṃsthite yajñe brāhmaṇaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2512: ya itthaṃ svāṃ duhitaramasmākaṃ svasāraṃ karotīti 1.7.4.[4]
GV03sb_01_u:2514: yo 'yaṃ devaḥ paśūnāmīṣṭe 'tisaṃdhaṃ vā ayaṃ carati ya itthaṃ svāṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2515: duhitaramasmākaṃ svasāraṃ karoti vidhyemamiti taṃ rudro 'bhyāyatya vivyādha
GV03sb_01_u:2516: tasya sāmi retaḥ pracaskanda tathennūnaṃ tadāsa 1.7.4.[5]
GV03sb_01_u:2520: taddevā retaḥ prājanayaṃsteṣāṃ yadā devānāṃ krodho vyaidatha
GV03sb_01_u:2521: prajāpatimabhiṣajyaṃstasya taṃ śalpaṃ nirakṛntantsa vai yajña eva prajāpatiḥ 1.7.4.[6]
GV03sb_01_u:2522: te hocuḥ / upajānīta yathedaṃ nāmuyāsatkanīyo hāhuteryathedaṃ syāditi 1.7.4.[7]
GV03sb_01_u:2523: te hocuḥ / bhagāyainaddakṣiṇata āsīnāya pariharata tadbhagaḥ prāśiṣyati
GV03sb_01_u:2524: tadyathāhutamevam bhaviṣyatīti tadbhagāya dakṣiṇata āsīnāya paryājahrustadbhago
GV03sb_01_u:2525: 'vekṣāṃ cakre tasyākṣiṇī nirdadāha tathennūnaṃ tadāsa tasmādāhurandho bhaga iti 1.7.4.[8]
GV03sb_01_u:2526: te hocuḥ / no nvevātrāśamatpūṣṇa enatpariharateti tatpūṣṇe paryājahrustatpūṣā prāśa
GV03sb_01_u:2527: tasya dato nirjaghāna tathennūnaṃ tadāsa tasmādāhuradantakaḥ pūṣeti tasmādyam
GV03sb_01_u:2528: pūṣṇe caruṃ kurvanti prapiṣṭānāmeva kurvanti yathādantakāyaivam 1.7.4.[9]
GV03sb_01_u:2529: te hocuḥ / no nvevātrāśamadbṛhaspataya enatpariharateti tadbṛhaspataye paryājahruḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2530: sa bṛhaspatiḥ savitārameva prasavāyopādhāvatsavitā vai devānām prasavitedam me
GV03sb_01_u:2531: prasuveti tadasmai savitā prasavitā prāsuvattadenaṃ savitṛprasūtaṃ nāhinattato
GV03sb_01_u:2546: pūrveṇa haike pariharanti purastādvai pratyañco yajamānam
GV03sb_01_u:2547: paśava upatiṣṭhante rudriyeṇa ha paśūnprasajedyatpūrveṇa pariharette 'sya gṛhāḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2548: paśava upamūryamāṇā īyustasmādityeva tiryakprajihīta tathā ha rudriyeṇa paśūnna
GV03sb_01_u:2551: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinorbāhubhyām pūṣṇo hastābhyām
GV03sb_01_u:2555: prasavitedam me prasuveti tadasmai savitā prasavitā prāsuvattadenaṃ savitṛprasūtaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2556: nāhinadevamevaiṣa etatsavitārameva prasavāyopadhāvati savitā vai devānām
GV03sb_01_u:2557: prasavitedam me prasuveti tadasmai savitā prasavitā prasauti tadenaṃ savitṛprasūtaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2560: agneṣṭvāsyena prāśnāmīti na vā agniṃ kiṃ cana hinasti tatho
GV03sb_01_u:2563: nenma idaṃ rudriyaṃ dato hinasaditi tasmānna dadbhiḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2569: sa etam bhāgam pratividāna āste yatprāśitraṃ tadasmai paryāhārṣustatprāśīdatha
GV03sb_01_u:2570: yamasmai brahmabhāgam paryāharanti tena bhāgī sa yadata ūrdhvamasaṃsthitaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2571: yajñasya tadabhigopāyati tasmādvā asmai brahmabhāgam paryāharanti 1.7.4.[20]
GV03sb_01_u:2574: yajṇaṃ kṣaṇvanti ye madhye yajñasya pākayajñiyayeḍayā caranti brahmā vā ṛtvijām
GV03sb_01_u:2575: bhiṣaktamastadbrahmā saṃdadhāti na ha saṃdadhyādyadvāvadyamāna āsīta
GV03sb_01_u:2577: sa yadi purā mānuṣīṃ vācaṃ vyāharet /
GV03sb_01_u:2579: vai viṣṇustadyajñam punarārabhate tasyo haiṣā prāyaścittiḥ 1.7.4.[22]
GV03sb_01_u:2580: sa yatrāha brahmanprasthāsyāmīti tadbrahmā japatyetaṃ te devā savitaryajñam
GV03sb_01_u:2581: prāhuriti tatsavitāram prasavāyopadhāvati sa hi devānām prasavitā bṛhaspataye
GV03sb_01_u:2582: brahmaṇa iti bṛhaspatirvai devānām brahmā tadya eva devānām brahmā tasmā
GV03sb_01_u:2583: evaitatprāha tasmādāha bṛhaspataye brahmaṇa iti tena yajñamava tena yajñapatiṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2588: dadhātviti yadvivṛḍhaṃ tatsaṃdadhāti viśve devāsa iha mādayantāmiti sarvaṃ vai
GV03sb_01_u:2589: viśve devāḥ sarveṇaivaitatsaṃdadhāti sa yadi kāmayeta brūyātpratiṣṭheti yadyu
GV03sb_01_u:2595: bibhṛhi mā pārayiṣyāmi tveti kasmānmā pārayiṣyasītyaugha
GV03sb_01_u:2596: imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā nirvoḍhā tatastvā pārayitāsmīti kathaṃ te bhṛtiriti 1.8.1[[.]]3
GV03sb_01_u:2597: sa hovāca / yāvadvai kṣullakā bhavāmo bahvī vai nastāvannāṣṭrā bhavatyuta matsya
GV03sb_01_u:2598: eva matsyaṃ gilati kumbhyām māgre bibharāsi sa yadā tāmativardhā atha karṣūṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2599: khātvā tasyām mā bibharāsi sa yadā tāmativardhā atha mā samudramabhyavaharāsi
GV03sb_01_u:2602: sa hi jyeṣṭhaṃ vardhate 'thetithīṃ samāṃ tadaugha āgantā
GV03sb_01_u:2603: tanmā nāvamupakalpyopāsāsai sa augha utthite nāvamāpadyāsai tatastvā pārayitāsmīti 1.8.1.[5]
GV03sb_01_u:2606: samāṃ nāvamupakalpyopāsāṃ cakre sa augha utthite nāvamāpede taṃ sa matsya
GV03sb_01_u:2607: upanyāpupluve tasya śṛṅge nāvaḥ pāśam pratimumoca tenaitamuttaraṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2609: sa hovāca / apīparaṃ vai tvā vṛkṣe nāvam pratibaghnīṣva taṃ tu tvā mā girau
GV03sb_01_u:2612: tāḥ sarvāḥ prajā niruvāhātheha manurevaikaḥ pariśiśiṣe 1.8.1.[7]
GV03sb_01_u:2615: mastvāmikṣāmityapsu juhavāṃ cakāra tataḥ saṃvatsare yoṣitsambabhūva sā ha
GV03sb_01_u:2616: pibdamānevodeyāya tasyai ha sma ghṛtam pade saṃtiṣṭhate tayā mitrāvaruṇau
GV03sb_01_u:2619: manorduhitetyāvayorbrūṣveti neti hovāca ya eva māmajījanata
GV03sb_01_u:2620: tasyaivāhamasmīti tasyāmapitvamīṣāte tadvā jajñau tadvā na jajñāvati tveveyāya sā
GV03sb_01_u:2623: tava duhiteti katham bhagavati mama duhiteti yā
GV03sb_01_u:2624: amūrapsvāhutīrahauṣīrghṛtaṃ dadhi mastvāmikṣāṃ tato māmajījanathāḥ sāśīrasmi
GV03sb_01_u:2625: tām mā yajñe 'vakalpaya yajñe cedvai māvakalpayiṣyasi bahuḥ prajayā
GV03sb_01_u:2626: paśubhirbhaviṣyasi yāmamuyā kāṃ cāśiṣamāśāsiṣyase sā te sarvā samardhiṣyata iti
GV03sb_01_u:2631: prajātiryāmvenayā kāṃ cāśiṣamāśāsta sāsmai sarvā samārdhyata 1.8.1.[11]
GV03sb_01_u:2633: sa yo haivaṃ vidvāniḍayā caratyetāṃ haiva prajātim prajāyate
GV03sb_01_u:2634: yām manuḥ prājāyata yāmvenayā kāṃ cāśiṣamāśāste sāsmai sarvā samṛdhyate 1.8.1.[12]
GV03sb_01_u:2636: paśavo vā iḍā pāṅtā vai paśavastasmātpañcāvattā bhavati 1.8.1.[13]
GV03sb_01_u:2647: idaṃ vai me taniṣṭhaṃ yajñasya yadiyamiḍā
GV03sb_01_u:2648: pākayajñiyā yadvai ma iha rakṣāṃsi yajñaṃ na hiṃsyuriti tāmetatpurā rakṣobhyaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:2649: purā rakṣobhya ityeva prāpayata tatho evaināmeṣa etatpurā rakṣobhyaḥ purā
GV03sb_01_u:2650: rakṣobhya ityeva prāpayate 'tha yatpratyakṣaṃ na prāśnāti nedanupahūtām
GV03sb_01_u:2654: śrayati tayātmaṃcūtayā hotā yajamānāyāśiṣamāśāste tasmāddhotuḥ pāṇau samavadyati 1.8.1.[18]
GV03sb_01_u:2656: etaddha vai manurbibhayāṃ cakāredaṃ vai me taniṣṭhaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2657: yajñasya yadiyamiḍā pākayajñiyā yadvai ma iha rakṣāṃsi yajñaṃ na hanyuriti
GV03sb_01_u:2658: tāmetatpurā rakṣobhyaḥ purā rakṣobhya ityevopāṃśūpāhvayata tatho evaināmeṣa
GV03sb_01_u:2661: upahūtaṃ rathantaraṃ saha pṛthivyopa māṃ rathantaraṃ saha pṛthivyā
GV03sb_01_u:2662: hvayatāmupahūtaṃ vāmadevyaṃ sahāntarikṣeṇopa māṃ vāmadevyaṃ sahāntarikṣeṇa
GV03sb_01_u:2663: hvayatāmupahūtam bṛhatsaha divopa mām bṛhatsaha divā hvayatāmiti
GV03sb_01_u:2664: tadetāmevaitadupahvayamāna imāṃśca lokānupahvayata etāni ca sāmāni 1.8.1.[20]
GV03sb_01_u:2683: tadarvācīmupahvayata upahūteḍeti tatparācīmupo asmāṃ iḍā hvayatāmiti
GV03sb_01_u:2688: yadevāsyai gṛtam pade samatiṣṭhata tasmādāha ghṛtapadīti 1.8.1.[27]
GV03sb_01_u:2690: yadeva mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ samagacata sa eva maitrāvaruṇo nyaṅgo
GV03sb_01_u:2691: brahmā devakṛtopahūteti brahmā hyeṣāṃ devakṛtopahūtopahūtā daivyā adhvaryava
GV03sb_01_u:2692: upahūtā manuṣyā iti taddaivāṃścaivādhvaryūnupahvayate ye ca mānuṣā vatsā vai
GV03sb_01_u:2693: daivyā adhvaryavo 'tha ya itare te mānuṣāḥ 1.8.1[.2]8
GV03sb_01_u:2694: ya imaṃ yajñamavānye ca yajñapatiṃ vardhāniti /
GV03sb_01_u:2696: śuśruvāṃso 'nūcānā ete hyenaṃ tanvata eta enaṃ janayanti tadu tebhyo nihnute vatsā
GV03sb_01_u:2697: u vai yajñapatiṃ vardhanti yasya hyete bhūyiṣṭhā bhavanti sa hi yajñapatirvardhate
GV03sb_01_u:2699: upahūte dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvaje ṛtāvarī devī devaputre iti tadime dyāvāpṛthivī
GV03sb_01_u:2701: tadyajamānamupahvayate tadyadatra nāma na gṛhṇāti pro 'kṣṃ hyatrāśīryadiḍāyām
GV03sb_01_u:2702: mānuṣaṃ ha kuryādyannāma gṛhṇīyādvyṛddhaṃ vai tadyajñasya yanmānuṣaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:2703: nedvyṛddhaṃ yajñe karavāṇīti tasmānna nāma gṛhṇāti 1.8.1.[30]
GV03sb_01_u:2710: tadasmā etatpaśūneva paro 'kṣamāśāste yasya hi paśavo bhavanti sa
GV03sb_01_u:2715: tadasmā etatprajāmeva paro 'kṣamāśāste yasya hi prajā bhavatyeka ātmanā
GV03sb_01_u:2716: bhavatyathota daśadhā prajayā haviṣkriyate tasmātprajā bhūyo haviṣkaraṇam 1.8.1.[35]
GV03sb_01_u:2720: eṣā vā āśīḥ jīveyam prajā me syācriyaṃ gaceyamiti tadyatpaśūnāśāste tacriyamāśāste
GV03sb_01_u:2721: śrīrhi paśavastadetābhyāmevaitadāśīrbhyāṃ sarvamāptaṃ tasmādvā ete atra dve
GV03sb_01_u:2725: tadyajñasyaivaitatsamṛddhimāśāste yaddhi devā havirjuṣante tena hi mahajjayati

GV03sb_01_u:3100: yāvanna samiṣṭayajurjuhvatīdaṃ nu no juhvatviti tābhya evaitattiraḥ karoti
GV03sb_01_u:3101: tasmādimā mānuṣya striyastira ivaiva puṃso jighatmanti yā iva tu tā iveti ha smāha
GV03sb_01_u:3105: abhiprajanayati tā imaṃ lokamimāḥ prajā abhiprajāyante tasmādagniṃ gṛhapatiṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3108: na hyatra paridhayo bhavanti na prastaro yatra vā adaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:3109: prastareṇa yajamānaṃ svagākaroti patiṃ vā anu jāyā tadevāsyāpi patnī svagākṛtā
GV03sb_01_u:3110: bhavatīyasi taṃ ha kuryādyatprastarasya rūpaṃ kuryāttasmādiḍāntameva syāduto
GV03sb_01_u:3124: atha juhūṃ ca sruvaṃ ca sampragṛhṇāti /
GV03sb_01_u:3126: devalokaṃ gacāditi tasmājjuhūṃ ca sruvaṃ ca sampragṛhṇāti 1.9.2.[20]
GV03sb_01_u:3130: didyoḥ pāhi prasityai pāhi duriṣṭyai pāhi duradmanyā iti sarvābhyo mārttibhyo
GV03sb_01_u:3131: gopāyetyevaitadāhāviṣaṃ naḥ pituṃ kṛṇvityannaṃ vai pituranamīvaṃ na
GV03sb_01_u:3132: idamakilviṣamannaṃ kurvityevaitadāha suṣadā yonāvityātmanyetadāha svāhā vāḍiti
GV03sb_01_u:3135: yoṣā vai vedirvṛṣā vedo mithunāya vai ved/aḥ
GV03sb_01_u:3136: kriyate 'tha yadenena yajña upālabhate mithunamevaitatprajananaṃ kriyate 1.9.2.[22]
GV03sb_01_u:3138: yoṣā vai patnī vṛṣā vedo mithunamevaitatprajananaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3141: vedo 'si yena tvaṃ deva veda devebhyo vedo 'bhavastena mahyaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3142: vedo bhūyā iti yadi yajuṣā cikīrṣedetenaiva kuryāt 1.9.2.[24]
GV03sb_01_u:3144: yoṣā vai vedirvṛṣā vedaḥ paścādvai parītya vṛṣā
GV03sb_01_u:3149: samiṣṭayajuḥ patnīḥ saṃyājayetpratyaṅṅu haivāsyaiṣa yajñaḥ saṃtiṣṭheta tasmādvā
GV03sb_01_u:3152: yā vā etena yajñena devatā hvayati yābhya eṣa
GV03sb_01_u:3153: yajñastāyate sarvā vai tattāḥ samiṣṭā bhavanti tadyattāsu sarvāsu
GV03sb_01_u:3156: yā vā etena yajñena devatā hvayati yābhya eṣa
GV03sb_01_u:3157: yajñastāyata upa ha vai tā āsate yāvanna samiṣṭayajurjuhvatīdaṃ nu no juhvatviti tā
GV03sb_01_u:3158: evaitadyathāyathaṃ vyavasṛjati yatra yatrāsāṃ caraṇaṃ tadanu yajñaṃ vā etadajījanata
GV03sb_01_u:3159: yadenamatata taṃ janayitvā yatrāsya pratiṣṭhā tatpratiṣṭhāpayati
GV03sb_01_u:3161: sa juhoti / devā gātuvida iti gātuvido hi devā gātuṃ vittveti yajñaṃ vittvetyevaitadāha
GV03sb_01_u:3162: gātumiteti tadetena yathāyathaṃ vyavasṛjati manasaspata imaṃ deva yajñaṃ svāhā
GV03sb_01_u:3163: vātte dhā ityayaṃ vai yajño yo 'yam pavate tadimaṃ yajñaṃ sambhṛtyaitasminyajñe
GV03sb_01_u:3164: pratiṣṭhāpayati yajñena yajñaṃ saṃdadhāti tasmādāha svāhā vāte dhā iti 1.9.2.[29]
GV03sb_01_u:3167: oṣadhīrdadhati tā imā asmiṃloka oṣadhayaḥ pratiṣṭhitāstasmādbarhirjuhoti 1.9.2.[30]
GV03sb_01_u:3170: samiṣṭayajuṣo 'tiriktaṃ tadyadā hi samiṣṭayajurjuhotyathaitābhyo juhoti tasmādimā
GV03sb_01_u:3172: sa juhoti / sam barhiraṅktāṃ haviṣā ghṛtena samādityairva/
GV03sb_01_u:3174: samindro viśvadevebhiraṅktāṃ divyaṃ nabho gacatu yatsvāheti 1.9.2.[32]
GV03sb_01_u:3176: yuṅkte vā etadyajñaṃ yadenaṃ tanute sa
GV03sb_01_u:3177: yanna ninayetparāṅu hāvimukta eva yajño yajamānam prakṣiṇīyāttatho ha yajño
GV03sb_01_u:3178: yajamānaṃ na prakṣiṇāti tasmātpraṇītā dakṣiṇataḥ parītya ninayati 1.9.2.[33]
GV03sb_01_u:3180: kastvā vimuñcati sa tvā vimuñcati kasmai tvā vimuñcati tasmai tvā
GV03sb_01_u:3181: vimuñcati poṣāyeti tatpuṣṭimuttamāṃ yajamānāyā nirāha sa yenaiva praṇayati tena
GV03sb_01_u:3182: ninayati yena hyeva yogyaṃ yuñjanti tena vimuñcanti yoktreṇa hi yogyaṃ yuñjanti
GV03sb_01_u:3186: ubhaye prājāpatyāḥ paspṛdhira etasminyajñe prajāpatau pitari
GV03sb_01_u:3188: tato devāḥ / sarvaṃ yajñaṃ saṃvṛjyātha yatpāpiṣṭhaṃ yajñasya
GV03sb_01_u:3190: asannityeṣa vai sunirbhakto yam bhāginaṃ nirbhajantyatha yamabhāgaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3191: nirbhajantyaiva sa tāvacaṃsata uta hi vaśo labdhvāha kim mā babhaktheti sa
GV03sb_01_u:3192: yamevaibhyo devā bhāgamakalpayaṃstamevaibhya eṣa etadbhāgaṃ karotyatha
GV03sb_01_u:3194: tatho evāsṛkpaśo rakṣasām bhāgo 'sītyanagnāvandhe tamasi praveśayati
GV03sb_01_u:3195: tasmātpaśostedanīṃ na kurvanti rakṣasāṃ hi sa bhagaḥ 1.9.3.[1]
GV03sb_01_u:3197: dakṣiṇataḥ parītya pūrṇapātraṃ ninayati tathā hyudagbhavati
GV03sb_01_u:3198: tasmāddakṣiṇataḥ parītya pūrṇapātraṃ ninayati devaloke me 'pyasaditi vai yajate yo
GV03sb_01_u:3199: yajate so 'syaiṣa yajño devalokamevābhipraiti tadanūcī dakṣiṇā yāṃ dadāti saiti
GV03sb_01_u:3201: sa eṣa devayāno vā pitṛyāṇo vā panthāḥ /
GV03sb_01_u:3203: tiṣṭhataḥ prati tamoṣato yaḥ pratyuṣyo 'tyu taṃ sṛjate yo 'tisṛṃjyaḥ
GV03sb_01_u:3205: pūrṇaṃ ninayati sarvaṃ vai pūrṇaṃ sarveṇaivainametacamayati saṃtatamavyavacinnaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3208: yadvai yajñasya mithyā kriyate vyasya tadvṛhanti
GV03sb_01_u:3209: kṣaṇvanti śāntirāpastadadbhiḥ śāntyā śamayati tadadbhiḥ saṃdadhāti 1.9.3.[5]
GV03sb_01_u:3214: saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tanūbhiraganmahi manasā saṃ śivena
GV03sb_01_u:3215: tvaṣṭā sudatro vidadhātu rāyo 'numārṣṭu tanno yadviliṣṭamiti yadvivṛḍhaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3221: devānvā eṣa prīṇāti yo yajata etena yajñena 'rgbhiriva
GV03sb_01_u:3222: tvadyajurbhiriva tvadāhutibhiriva tvatsa devānprītvā teṣvapitvī bhavati teṣvapitvī
GV03sb_01_u:3225: yajño vai viṣṇuḥ sa devebhya imāṃ vikrāntiṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3228: viṣṇuryajño vikrāntiṃ vikramate tasmādviṣṇukramān kramate tadvā ita eva
GV03sb_01_u:3232: 'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmo 'ntarikṣe viṣṇurvyakraṃsta traiṣṭubhena candasā
GV03sb_01_u:3233: tato nirbhakto yo 'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmo divi viṣṇurvyakraṃsta jāgatena
GV03sb_01_u:3234: candasā tato nirbhakto yo 'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma
GV03sb_01_u:3235: ityevamimāṃllokāntsamāruhyāthaiṣā gatireṣā pratiṣṭhā ya eṣa tapati tasya ye
GV03sb_01_u:3236: raśmayaste sukṛto'tha yatparam bhāḥ prajāpatirvā sa svargo vā
GV03sb_01_u:3238: parastāttvevārvāṅ krameta ya ito 'nuśāsanaṃ cikīrṣeddūyaṃ tadyasmātparastādarvāṅ
GV03sb_01_u:3239: kramate 1.9.3'pasaraṇato ha vā agre devā jayanto 'jayan /
GV03sb_01_u:3246: jāgatena candasā tato nirbhakto yo 'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3247: ca vayaṃ dviṣmo 'ntarikṣe viṣṇurvyakraṃsta traiṣṭubhena candasā tato nirbhakto
GV03sb_01_u:3248: yo 'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ pṛthivyāṃ viṣṇurvyakraṃsta gāyatreṇa candasā
GV03sb_01_u:3249: tato nirbhakto yo 'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmo 'smādannādasyai pratiṣṭhāyā
GV03sb_01_u:3250: ityasyāṃ hīdaṃ sarvamannādyam pratiṣṭhita tasmādāhāsmādannādasyai pratiṣṭhāyā
GV03sb_01_u:3255: aganma svariti devā vai svaraganma devānityevaitadāha saṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3258: saiṣā gatireṣāpratiṣṭhā tadetāṃ gatimetām pratiṣṭhāṃ gacati
GV03sb_01_u:3262: raśmiryatsūryastasmādāha svayambhūrasi śreṣṭho raśmiriti varcodā asi varco me
GV03sb_01_u:3263: dehīti tvevāhaṃ bravīmīti ha smāha yājñavalkyastaddhyeva brāhmaṇenaiṣṭhavyaṃ
GV03sb_01_u:3264: yadbrahmavarcasī syādityuto ha smāhaupoditeya eṣa vāva mahyaṃ gā dāsyati godā
GV03sb_01_u:3265: gā me dehītyevaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate so 'smai kāmaḥ samṛdhyate 1.9.3.[16]
GV03sb_01_u:3271: gārhapatyo gṛhā vai pratiṣṭhā tadgṛheṣvevaitatpratiṣṭhāyām pratitiṣṭhati
GV03sb_01_u:3276: sugṛhapatistvaṃ mayāgne gṛhapatinā bhūyā iti nātra tirohitamivāstyasthūri nau
GV03sb_01_u:3277: gārhapatyāni santvityanārttāni nau gārhapatyāni santvityevaitadāha śataṃ himā iti
GV03sb_01_u:3278: śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvyāsamityevaitadāha tadapyetadbruvannādriyetāpi hi bhūyāṃsi
GV03sb_01_u:3284: idam me 'yaṃ vīryam putro 'nusaṃtanavaditi yadi putro
GV03sb_01_u:3289: idamahaṃ ya evāsmi so 'smītyamānuṣa iva vā etadbhavati
GV03sb_01_u:3290: yadvratamupaiti na hi tadavakalpate yadbrūyādidamahaṃ satyādanṛtamupaimīti tadu
GV03sb_01_u:3291: khalu punarmānuṣo bhavati tasmādidamahaṃ ya evāsmi sā 'smītyevaṃ vrataṃ
